video.title: Modern Marvels: Collection
video.synopsis: Blending facts with humor, this series explores history-changing technology, from wonders of construction and war machinery to everyday power tools.

episodes.synopsis: The engineering of food trucks is explored, from designing early chuck wagons and hot dog carts to today's gourmet and high-tech eateries on wheels.
episodes.title: Food Trucks

episodes.synopsis: From famed leaders to everyday citizens, most people carry unique objects through daily life. The items Americans keep in their pockets are explored.
episodes.title: Pocket Tools

episodes.synopsis: Handmade constructions are featured. A pilot builds a jet-powered glider; museum artists compile skeletons; film animators create special effects.
episodes.title: Built by Hand

episodes.synopsis: A look inside apparently mundane structures reveals a hidden world that can house huge masses of dangerous pests or contain life-saving technology.
episodes.title: Inside Your Walls

episodes.synopsis: Helicopters used by the military, law enforcement, the Coast Guard and private owners who customize for luxury -- as well as drones -- are featured.
episodes.title: Helicopters

episodes.synopsis: Some of the largest, fastest and most powerful machines on the planet are featured -- vehicles that require training, experience and guts to handle.
episodes.title: Driver's Seat

episodes.synopsis: The logistics behind feeding huge crowds, including the military, fans at an NFL game, awards event attendees and airline passengers, are explored.
episodes.title: Mega Meals

episodes.synopsis: Nobody likes it when a foul odor hits us in the nose, so what have humans done to deal with awful stenches over the years?
episodes.title: Stink

episodes.synopsis: Water is all around us, but we spend a lot of our time and effort trying to stay dry. See how technology has developed to help humans battle H2O.
episodes.title: Waterproof

episodes.synopsis: Though plastic and other materials have been developed over the last century, wood has been the building block of civilization for thousands of years.
episodes.title: Wood

episodes.synopsis: Go inside the inner workings of a 7-Eleven store to see how it's designed and how technology is used to bring consumers favorites like Slurpees.
episodes.title: Convenience Stores

episodes.synopsis: Some of the world's deadliest modern weapons are small enough to fit into your pocket. See examples of the newest and most exciting tiny inventions.
episodes.title: Tiny Weapons

episodes.synopsis: The concept of pressure is seen everywhere around us -- in a can of soda and deep beneath a volcano. See how changes in pressure rock our world.
episodes.title: Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Shoes were once a simple foot covering but have evolved over the years to provide comfort, stability and performance in a variety of conditions.
episodes.title: Shoes

episodes.synopsis: Surviving in the harsh terrain and climate of America's last frontier requires an innovative array of technological advances.
episodes.title: Alaska
